3540.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|94|308$أَخَذْنَا|We took|75|93|625$مِنَ|from|50|68|156$ٱلنَّبِيِّــۧنَ|the Prophets|105|123|611$مِيثَـٰقَهُمْ|their Covenant|118|136|4607$وَمِنكَ|and from you|107|125|13929$وَمِن|and from|78|87|1133$نُّوحٍ|Nuh|60|69|4641$وَإِبْرَٲهِيمَ|and Ibrahim|105|122|13593$وَمُوسَىٰ|and Musa|97|114|5792$وَعِيسَى|and Isa,|95|112|1238$ٱبْنِ|son|52|70|5009$مَرْيَمَ‌ۖ|(of) Maryam.|106|124|833$وَأَخَذْنَا|And We took|105|114|4605$مِنْهُم|from them|87|193|730$مِّيثَـٰقًا|a covenant|95|308|3853$غَلِيظًا|strong|78|184|3854$

3541.verse: لِّيَسْــَٔلَ|That He may ask|132|153|13930$ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ|the truthful|113|156|5400$عَن|about|58|101|1105$صِدْقِهِمْ‌ۚ|their truth.|93|136|13931$وَأَعَدَّ|And He has prepared|158|179|4329$لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|for the disbelievers|146|237|236$عَذَابًا|a punishment|108|290|2933$أَلِيمًا|painful.|68|159|3828$

3543.verse: إِذْ|When|57|70|1198$جَآءُوكُم|they came upon you|156|183|4285$مِّن|from|50|77|53$فَوْقِكُمْ|above you|89|116|5686$وَمِنْ|and from|78|105|1133$أَسْفَلَ|below|68|95|7274$مِنكُمْ|you,|65|78|643$وَإِذْ|and when|84|101|308$زَاغَتِ|grew wild|83|117|13935$ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ|the eyes|99|133|5909$وَبَلَغَتِ|and reached|102|136|13936$ٱلْقُلُوبُ|the hearts|89|123|9451$ٱلْحَنَاجِرَ|the throats,|100|117|13937$وَتَظُنُّونَ|and you assumed|135|213|10401$بِٱللَّهِ|about Allah|94|250|79$ٱلظُّنُونَا۟|the assumptions.|133|211|13938$

3545.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|93|308$يَقُولُ|said|66|82|77$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ|the hypocrites|116|132|7309$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those|86|102|42$فِى|in|48|64|89$قُلُوبِهِم|their hearts|97|113|66$مَّرَضٌ|(was) a disease,|130|138|90$مَّا|`Not|51|75|262$وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ|Allah promised us|134|182|13941$وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ|and His messenger|143|191|5068$إِلَّا|except|65|113|86$غُرُورًا|delusion.`|90|114|4483$

3547.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|65|179$دُخِلَتْ|had been entered|137|151|13948$عَلَيْهِم|upon them|90|104|22$مِّنْ|from|50|64|53$أَقْطَارِهَا|all its sides|99|113|13949$ثُمَّ|then|50|64|293$سُئِلُواْ|they had been asked|159|166|13950$ٱلْفِتْنَةَ|the treachery,|116|128|7633$لَأَتَوْهَا|they (would) have certainly done it|255|280|13951$وَمَا|and not|71|96|46$تَلَبَّثُواْ|they (would) have hesitated|209|221|13952$بِهَآ|over it|63|181|1203$إِلَّا|except|65|300|86$يَسِيرًا|a little.|76|194|3934$

3548.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|118|640$كَانُواْ|they had|79|102|94$عَـٰهَدُواْ|promised|89|112|935$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|76|184$مِن قَبْلُ|before,|92|115|250$لَا|not|42|65|30$يُوَلُّونَ|they would turn|125|136|13953$ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ‌ۚ|their backs.|98|120|3169$وَكَانَ|And is|71|116|363$عَهْدُ|(the) promise|109|154|13954$ٱللَّهِ|(to) Allah|82|126|606$مَسْــُٔولاً|to be questioned.|137|159|10347$

3540.verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant.

3541.verse: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.

3542.verse: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to [attack] you and We sent upon them a wind and armies [of angels] you did not see. And ever is Allah, of what you do, Seeing.

3543.verse: [Remember] when they came at you from above you and from below you, and when eyes shifted [in fear], and hearts reached the throats and you assumed about Allah [various] assumptions.

3544.verse: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.

3545.verse: And [remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, "Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion,"

3546.verse: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you [here], so return [home]." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee.

3547.verse: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly.

3548.verse: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah [that about which one will be] questioned.
